title: Data Scientist
description:
UST (www.ust.com) is looking for Data Science Engineer for Bangalore Location.




Basic Qualifications:




• Proficient in Python based model development using Data Science techniques

• Development experience in algorithms on regression modelling (linear/logistic), supervised and unsupervised classification, tree-based techniques (Decision trees /Random forest), neural nets, bagging, Pattern Mining and boosting techniques, etc.

• Hands on experience in developing models using concepts of Machine Learning (such as Keras, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Azure ML, AWS ML, Scikit, Jupyter, MatLab etc.)

• Experience in SQL (including advanced analytical functions), and query optimization techniques

• Good SW Engineering skills to optimize model code and performance

• Working experience in agile/SAFe development methodologies

• Experience in using GitHub and Git Workflows

• Experience in machine logs processing, text mining and text analytics will be added advantage




Kindly share me your updated CV, current CTC, expected CTC, Official notice period (If serving NP, what is LWD).
